content: I heard that there's someone who often mixes me up with Mobai, so I took the liberty of bringing a mirror to Mobai. We looked in it together moo, and our colors are completely different!

content: Maybe that "someone" is colorblind? Then when she drives... moo! When she speeds... moo! Now it all makes sense.
